Title: Enacts the "in-route safety inspection for motor coach vehicles act"
Summary: Enacts the "in-route safety inspection for motor coach vehicles act"; establishes a framework for mandatory in-route inspections for motor coach vehicles carrying 16 or more passengers to reduce the risk of accidents and enhance operational oversight.
ActClause: AN ACT amending the transportation law, in relation to establishing in-route safety inspections for motor coach vehicles designed to carry 16 or more passengers
